ygData.subject: Re: New Bard...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Let me see if I have this right.  A bash will stop your song, but a bash will not necessarily stun you.  So all those times when I m knocked out of my song
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Jun 1999, J.M. Capozzi wrote:
>
> Dex helps you hit more often. For non bards, it also helps parry, block,
> and riposte skills some. For 'real' casters, it can increase resumed
> casting chances, combined with Channeling. It has NO effect on 'twisting'.
> None. Nada. Zilch. ANY bash will stop your song, period, there is no way
> around it. Normal hits do not.

Let me see if I have this right. A bash will stop your song,
but a bash will not necessarily stun you. So all those times
when I'm knocked out of my song without being stunned, it's a
bash which did damage, but didn't stun me?

> Best I can figure, after 40 odd levels of barding, is that Charisma is a
> very very mild stat for anything other than shopping. Even wearing a

Also, with the Charisma song fixed, it is even less of a
factor.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
